price: Ya Tuhan kami, sesungguhnya Engkau mengetahui apa yang kami sembunyikan dan apa yang kami tampakkan; dan tidak ada sesuatu pun yang tersembunyi bagi Allah, baik yang ada di bumi maupun yang ada di langit.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ تَعۡلَمُ مَا نُخۡفِي وَمَا نُعۡلِنُۗ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka taʿlamu mā nukh'fī wamā nuʿ'linu wamā yakhfā ʿalā al-lahi min shayin fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
